basics.name: Abhishek Dave
basics.summary: 5th year PhD student in Cognitive Sciences at University of California, Irvine. Interested in sleep, brain dynamics, and memory in aging and neurodegenerative disorders.

courses: Cortical Neuroscience, Neural Time Series, Intro to Statistical Learning, Perception and Attention, Sleep and Memory, Intro to Functional MRI
Machine Learning, Linear Models, Dynamical Systems, Bayesian Cognitive Modeling, Longitudinal Data Analysis, Digital Signal Processing, Stochastic Processes
